content.prompt: The writer is considering deleting sentence 9 from the passage. Should the writer keep or delete sentence 9?

choices.label: Keep it, because the evidence it provides is likely to appeal to the audience’s values in terms of their experience with teenagers seeking part-time employment.
Keep it, because it provides anecdotal evidence about teen employment that is expanded on later in the passage.
Delete it, because the writer’s choice of diction creates an inappropriately informal tone.
Delete it, because the anecdote about local teenagers weakens the reasoning of the argument at this point of the passage.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
